rin po che'i tog gi gzungs 'di las tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gang la la'i rna lam du grags pa na tha na ri dvags dang / bya'ang rung ste / de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro // rigs kyi bu dag / de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal gyi zhabs g-yas pa'i mthe bos sa la reg par mdzad de / de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas kyang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g-yos par byin gyis brlabs nas phyogs bcu dag gi lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dvags dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / mi dang / mi ma @316b yin ba grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams shin tu skrag pa skyes par gyur te / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad kyang snang bas rgya cher khyab par gyur te / lag mthil lta bur mnyam par 'dug cing / de'i tshe na ri dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / ri rab dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po'ang mi snang bar gyur to // lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin de dag kyang sa g-yos pa dang / snang ba nges skrag pa skyes par gyur te / bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus phyogs bzhir bltas pa dang / de dag thams cad kyi mnga' rgyang gang tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa mthong nas de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te thal mo sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la lta'o // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // // rigs kyi bu / gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal gyi zhabs g-yas pa'i ma the bo sa la reg pa na'ang 'di bzhin du de'i tshe sa g-yos par gyur / de'i tshe 'di bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'ang lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par g-yos par gyur / 'dug / 'di bzhin du snang ba dang / sa g-yo bas skrag pa skyes te lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin thams cad phyogs bzhir lta zhing mda' rgyang gang tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal de mthong nas thal mo sbyar te / rigs kyi bu dag /

column1: dRzwvA idam tasya etat aBavat
column2: mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems so //

column1: satya vAdI mahA RziH ayam mahA anuBAvaH pUjA arhaH
column2: bden par 'di ni / drang srong chen po mthu che zhing mchod par 'os pa ste / lha dang / mis mchod par @346b snang ngo // 'di'i lus thams cad kyang bsod nams kyi mtshan gyis brgyan te / mkhas shing slob dpon yin par shes so // bdag cag gnyis gang rgan / gang mkhas pa de la ngas ji ltar brtag snyam ste / de nas yang 'di ltar bdag gis mdun bsu la / 'di la rigs dang / rus dang / gnas dang / brtul zhugs kun dri'o // snyam du sems so // de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bdag gi 'khor la bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so // thos ldan yid 'thad brtul zhugs che 'dzin mchod pa'i rigs par snang // ye shes chos don ldan zhing thub mchog bzod 'di lam rab mkhyen // khyed cag thams cad 'di la gus par mchod chen yang dag sbyor // yon tan ldan pa 'di las 'khor mthar 'gro ba'i legs bshad mnyan // de nas bram ze'i khye'u de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu mkhan po / de bzhin du bgyi'o // zhes smras so // de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba g-yog dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to // khyed su zhig / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / nga ni / bram ze'o // gsol pa / gdung rus ci / bka' stsal pa / nga'i rus ni / goo ta ma'o // gsol pa / khyod kyi brtul zhugs ci / bka' stsal pa / @347a *// nga'i brtul zhugs ni / rnam par thar pa gsum mo // gsol pa / khyod kyi spyod pa ci / bka' stsal pa / nga ni / yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin nyid la spyod do // gsol pa / khyod rab tu byung nas ji srid lon / bka' stsal pa / ma rig pa byung nas ji srid lon pa nga rab tu byung nas kyang de srid lon no // gsol pa / drang srong chen po // skar ma'i bshad pa lung bstan pa'i rig pa gsung ngam / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / sgro btags pa med par mnyam pa nyid du'o // 'di ni / 'jig rten gyi shes pa ste / de la snying po ci zhig yod / drang srong gis gsol pa / mkhas pa rnams dga' bar bgyid pa'o // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / skar ma'i gnas gang yin / drang srong gis gsol pa / gang zla ba dang / nyi ma brten cing rjes su rgyu ba'i rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad brjod pa 'di dag go / de la mdzub ni / sor brgyad kyi tshad de / mdzub de'i tshad kyis lus la srid du mdzub bcu gnyis par rig par bgyi'o // klad pa'i spyi bo la mdzub gang dang / rkang pa'i mthil la mdzub gang ste / mdzub bcu bzhi ni / skar ma rnams kyi gnas so // gang de dag na gda' ba ni / rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur te / skar ma gang dang gang la bcas pa de dang / de dag na gda'o // yang gang zhe na / de bshad par bgyi @347b yi thub pa chen po gson cig / smin drug la ni su btsas pa // de yi gdong gi sor bzhi na // g-yas phyogs na ni sme ba mchis // spu can nag la mdog kyang dmar // longs spyod bdog cing grags dang ldan // mkhas shing rab tu dpal 'bar te // smin drug la ni skyes pa yi // mtshan ma nyid ni de lags so // gang zhig la ni sor bzhi na // sme ba 'di nyid gda' ba de // snar ma la ni skyes pa ste // shes shing rtag tu chos la dga'// mkhas la longs spyod phun sum tshogs // rnam pa kun tu mdzes dang ldan // dpa' zhing rgyal ba phun sum tshogs // dgra rnams rtag par rab tu 'joms // mgul ba yi ni mdzub phyed na // gang la tshig pa 'dra gda' ba // de ni mgo la skyes pa ste // dpa' zhing longs spyod ldan pa'o // mdzub kyi phyed po gnyis pa la; ;g-yon pa skye ba gang mchis pa // lag la skyes pa khro ba ste // de ni blun zhing longs spyod bdog / mtshan khung g-yon na sme nag mchis // nabs so la ni skyes pa ste // nor dang 'bru rnams 'byor bar 'gyur // de ni shes pa'i rgyu yang chung // ji ltar khyod ni rgyal la skyes // mtshan mchog dag ni rab tu gda'// phyag gi mthil na 'khor lo ni // nyi ma lta bur rab tu mdzes; ;dbu skra dag ni thams cad kyang // gyen du g-yas 'khyil legs par mchis // sku ni chu zheng gab pa ste // 'dren pa khyed kyis nyon mongs thul // tshig 'dra gang gi snying ga mchis // @348a *// skag la skyes te 'thab mo sred // tshul khrims 'chal zhing 'grogs mi bde // de ni g-yem la dga' ba'o // 'og gam brang ngam rgya ba cig na // gang la byi sran 'dra ba gda'// mchu las skyes te nor dang ldan // btsun zhing chos dang ldan pa'i mi // lte ba g-yas g-yon gnyis ka na // gang la rme 'dra gda' ba ni // de ni gre la skyes pa ste // ser sna che zhing tshe yang thung // lte ba man chad sor bzhin // gang la sme ba rab gda' ba // sbo la de skyes longs spyod can // khrims ldan shi 'phos mtho ris mchi // me bzhi la ni skyes pa dag / sme ba dmar po chu sor gda'// rku zhing g-yo can sgyu ma ste // bsod nams chung zhing shes pa zhan // gang gi mtshan la sme ba ni // gda' bar gyur pa nges par yang // nag pa la ni skyes pa ste // 'dod chags glu gar dag tu dga'// mtshan gyi 'og gam steng na ni // sme ba dmar po rab tu gda'// sa ri la ni de skyes te // mi mkhas brkam zhing mang po sdang // brla gnyis kyi ni mdzub gang na // sme ba dmar po de bzhin te // sa ga la ste shor ba mchog / skyes pa bud med rnams kyis bskor // mkhas shing dpa' la dgra yang thul // rtag tu bde la gnas pa ste; ;ngo tsha shes shing brtan dang ldan // shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris skye // brla gnyis kyi ni mdzub do na // gang la byi sran 'dra ba gda'// lha mtshams la ste tshul khrims can // chos @348b dang longs spyod ldan ba'o // gang gi brla 'og gnyis na ni // sme ba gda' ba snon la skyes // mi sdug tshe thung tshul khrims 'chal // dbul zhing snying rje ma mchis so // pus mo gnyis ka'i gong na ni; ;gang la rma chung gda' ba de // snubs la skyes te dbang thang can // myur du bdag khyim zhig par bgyid // chu stod la ni skyes pa dag / sme ba pus mo'i lhang na // sbyin pa bgyid cing chos lam 'tshal // shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris mchi // chu smad la ni su skyes pa // gru do la ni sme ba mchis // de ltar gda' ba shes dang ldan // longs spyod ldan zhing sems can byams // sme ba gnyis po gda' ba ni // gro bzhin la ste longs spyod rtag / de bzhin nad med sems can byams // shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris mchi // sme ba nag po rje ngar la // gda' ba mon grur skyes pa ste // de ni khro zhing 'dod chags chung // longs spyod ma mchis shes rab ldan // rje ngar la ni mdzub do na // sme ba nag po rab tu gda'// mon gre la skyes blun po ste // de ni chu yis 'chi bar 'gyur // rje ngar 'og gi mdzub gang na // rma 'dra mchis pa khrums stod la // blun zhing gzhan la gnod pa bgyid // de ni dbul zhing rkun po bgyid // gang la sme ba mdzub gong na // khrums smad la ni skyes pa ste // sbyin dang tshul khrims dran pa dang // shes rab 'jigs med snying rjer ldan // gang gi rkang pa gnyi ga la // sme ba phra mo gda' ba ni // nam grur skyes pa ma rabs te // @349a *// 'breg mkhan du yang 'gyur ba lags // gang gi mthe bo'i phrag na yang // sme ba sdon po gda' ba ni // rtag tu stobs ldan nad ma mchis // tha skar la ni de skyes so; ;rkang mthil sme ba mchis pa ni // bra nye la ste snying brtse med // gsod pa'i gshed ma'i ngang tshul can // shi 'phos nas ni dmyal bar mchi // gang gis spyod pa 'tshal ba yi // skar ma'i gnas ni 'di dag lags // 'jig rten na ni rnam shes 'dis // sems can rnams ni pha rol 'dren // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / kun tu rtog pa'i spyod yul can // byis pa gang la chags 'dug pa // de ni byis pa rmongs pa ste // sems la gnas shing rims nad bcas // khyi dang sbrul dang rus spal dang // srog chags gzhan yang rnam mang po // skar ma rgyal la gang skyes pa // de dag bde la brten pa yin // ji ltar bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul dang // thar pa khyod kyis rnyed pa bzhin // nga yang thams cad gzigs pa na; ;ci phyir nga la khyod mi 'dri // de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor nas yid rab tu dga' ste 'di skad ces gsol to // drang srong mi yi gzugs su ni // mtshan mchog rnams kyang shin tu gda'// khyod kyi gdung rus ma 'tshal na // lha'am 'on te khyod mi lags // gsung dang dbyangs dag 'byin pa ni // tshangs @349b pa chen po bzhin du gda'// spyod pa'i gnas kyang tshul gyis ni // sngon gyi drang srong rnams dang 'dra // thub pa ci 'dra phun sum tshogs // 'di sngon ma mthong ma thos na // khyod kyi ston gang de ci smra // khyod kyi gdung rus ci lags gsungs // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa // pha rol tshu rol mi shes shing // mtshan ma la ni gang gnas pa // de dag sdug bsngal kun gyis bcings // de ni thar pa'i snod ma yin // pha rol phyin drug nga yi rus // bram ze mngon shes drug dang ldan // yang dag dga' bya drug smra zhing // dbang po drug ni rnam par bshig / chos gsum rtogs pa'i shes dang ldan // nga yi spyod pa rnam thar gsum // byang chub sems ni nam skyes pa // de tshe nga ni rab tu byung // mtshan ma rnams ni ngas ma dmigs // mtshan ma med pa rab tu bsgoms // sems can med cing srog med pa // bdag med stong par mngon sangs rgyas // tshor ba gsum dang 'du byed gsum // stong pa nyid du rnam par bsgoms // nga ni ye shes pha rol song // nga yi tshigs 'di gsungs pa med // gang dag mkha' bzhin ma chags par // byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed pa // de dag bzod stobs phun sum tshogs // ye shes 'di 'dra thob par 'gyur // chos rnams la ni mi 'jug cing // rnam par smin pa 'dod med la // de bzhin nyid las 'gal mi byed // de dag byang chub rnyed mi dka'// chos rnams la ni mi gnas shing // pha rol tshu rol @350a *// mi brten par // yang dag mthar ni 'dir bsgoms na // de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur // mtshan nyid med cing mtshan ma'ang med // dmigs pa de ni rnam par spangs // chos rnams kun dang ma 'dres na // de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur // rang gi mtshan nyid 'dir 'ong la // rang gi sems la the tshom spongs // nam mkha' 'dra bar shes nas su // nga 'dra sangs rgyas khyod 'gyur byos //

column1: RzijyotIrasa prasAda parivartaH nAma caturTaH
column2: drang srong skar ma la dga' ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o //// bam po lnga pa / de nas bdud bye ba dag 'di snyam du sems te / ji ltar grong khyer 'di'i phyi rol lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dag gis brgyan pa de bzhin du bdag cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer 'di'i sgo gang dang / gang nas gshegs pa de'i sgo de dang / de'i sa phyogs bkod pa'i rgyan dam pa khyad par du 'phags pas brgyan to snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdud bye ba de dag gi sems kyi kun tu rtog pa mkhyen nas 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad de / 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas grong khyer gyi sgo bcu gnyis su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bcu gnyis grong khyer gyi sgo re re nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs so // bdud bye ba de dag kyang nam mkha' la gnas bzhin du bdud kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul grangs med pa @354a *// dang ldan pa bkod pa'i mchog rnams dang / bkod pa mdzes pa rnams kyi grong khyer gyi sgo de dag dang / sa'i phyogs de dag dang / rtsig pa de dag dang / shing de dag dang / sa'i ngos de dag brgyan to // bdud bye ba de dag dang / bdud kyi 'khor de dag la la ni / tshangs pa'i cha byad lta bu nas drang srong chen po'i cha byad lta bu'i bar du bsgyur te nam mkha' la gnas bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi skar khung dang / rta babs dang / ba gam dang / skyed shing gi nang du me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig sna tshogs kyis spras pa dang / gos dang / ras dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyan rnams kyi char ni / rab tu phab / sil snyan dang / dkrol ba sna tshogs ni / dkrol nas bstod pa dang / yon tan bsngags pa sna tshogs kyi dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do // bcom ldan 'das de ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba chen po sngon ma thos pa'i bkod pa mchog tu rgya che ba / khyad par du 'phags pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo nas zhugs te zhabs g-yas pa'i mthe bo'i sgo'i them pa la reg par mdzad do // bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i them pa la reg ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong @354b chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g-yos so // gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / sa dang / chu dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor gyi lha dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / lha'i drang srong chen po'i 'khor dang / 'og min gyi bar nas bzung ste sems can gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad sa g-yos par snang ba des bskul ma thag tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po khor khor yug tu bsgor nas sa dang nam mkha' la gnas shing me tog dang / spos dang / dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phye ma'i bar gyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis me tog dang / phye ma'i bar de dag phyogs bcu'i phyogs kyi cha re re na'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa rnams su sangs rgyas la mchod cing bsti stang bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' la gtor ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu me tog dang / phye ma dang / rgyan @355a *// de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // myur du sad par gyis la 'di dag ltos // byang chub phyir ni bag yod spyad pa spyod // khyod kyi 'khor ba'i gcong rong 'khyams pa yi // 'jig rten thams cad dag ni bsgral bar byos // yongs su smin dang ldan pa'i dus bab kyi // g-yeng bar gyur pa rab tu myur thong la // 'dir ni sngon gyi dam bcas yid la byos // byang chub lung bstan rab tu thob par 'gyur // thub dbang drang srong chen po mya ngan med // 'gro la phan phyir de ring grong khyer gshegs // bdud stong bye ba rang gis pham mdzad de // de ni chos kyi 'khor lo myur du bskor // grogs po zhi ba 'di la 'gro dga' mdzad // dpa' mchog dngos po yang dag ston par mdzad // 'gro ba sdug bsngal dag las thar mdzad nas // byang chub tu ni de ring lung yang ston // rang byung mya ngan med pa grong khyer gshegs // de phyir zhing der rab tu myur gshegs la // de ltar mdzes pa de dag rab bltas te // rim gyis byang chub tu yang 'gyur bar byos // yang de'i tshe 'od ma'i chal na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos dang / nyan thos chen po gang dag nang du yang dag par 'jog la gnas pa de dag gis ston pa de la bltas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na 'dul ba la @355b gzhes shing bzhugs pa mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su 'khod pa dang / bkod pa chen po de dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas me tog dang / phye ma'i rgyan de dag las tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra gang byung ba de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad du gang bar gyur to // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos gang dag gnas pa de dag gis sgra de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te / yid du 'ong ba 'di lta bu / ro myang bar 'os pa 'di lta bu / dga' bar bya bar 'os pa 'di lta bu / tshim par byed par 'os pa 'di lta bu / spro bar byed pa 'di lta bu'i yon tan chen po brjod par 'os pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'di dag dang / me tog dang / phye ma'i char 'di dag gi [?] las 'ongs snyam mo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag rang gi dge ba'i phyogs btang ste ngo mtshar cher 'dzin par gyur to // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyu mthun @356a *// pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so // bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bkod pa chen po 'di lta bu dag snang ste / 'di lta ste / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag cing rdul bsags pa med ces bya ba'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'di 'dra ba dang ldan par 'gyur / rtsig pa med la legs par brgyan pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad du'ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na shin tu lham me / lhan ne; lhang nger bzhugs par snang ba ni / ma gtogs so // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu'ang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag sgra thos pa des bskul ba dang / phyogs bzhir blta zhing 'khod de / de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ha cang yang mi ring ba na 'dug par mthong ngo // sangs @356b rgyas kyi yul gyis lha'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyan de dag thams cad par mthong ngo // kyang mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag par mthong ngo // kyang mthong ngo // dang / nyan thos chen po de dag 'di snyam du sems par mthong ngo // kyang mthong ngo //

column1: start rkp
column2: dang / te / bdag cag kyang 'dus pa chen po'i bkod pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag blta ba dang / brtag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la'ang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir der 'dong ngo // der ni / bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'ang thob par 'gyur gor ma chag snyam mo // de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / nyan thos chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas mi snang bar gyur te skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir thams cad dang / phyin to // de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams kyang 'dir lhags nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad sa dang / nam mkha'i bar ma lus par @357a *// gang bar gyur to // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs kyi rgyu mthun pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la dag gis ni / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad me tog sna tshogs kyi char gyis khebs par byas so // la la dag gis ni; mu tig gi char phab pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni / gser dang / dngul dang / bee d'urya dang / shel dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / go shirsha dang / tsandan sbrul gyi snying po dang / shing ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma'i char gyis nam mkha' khebs par byas so // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni / lhab lhub dang / 'phyang 'phrul dang / rgyan dang / ras dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab bo // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni / rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs bsgreng ngo // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa @357b bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni / spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs so // la la dag gis ni / rin po che'i phreng ba sna tshogs gtor to // la la dag gis ni / sil snyan dang / dkrol ba sna tshogs dkrol to // la la dag gis ni / glu dang / gar dang / rol mo'i sgra rab tu bstan to // la la dag gis ni / sa phyogs der spos chu sna tshogs kyi char gyis chag chag btab bo; ;la la dag gis ni / rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod rnams rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkang ste bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thogs so // la la dag gis ni / rin po che'i snod sna tshogs rnams spos chus bkang ste me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo mas brgyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na thogs so // la la dag gis ni / rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs lha'i gos dang / rgyan dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas 'phang stong de thogs so // la la dag gis ni / bdag nyid tshangs pa chen po'i cha byad du mngon par sprul te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te 'khod pa nas rgya cher ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin no // la la dag ni / sengge'i cha byad du mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas 'khod do // bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pas sems can de dag phan tshun mig gi dbang @358a *// pos gzugs snang ba rnams la thags thogs med do // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang de lta bu'i bdud kyi yul chen po lha'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs rnams dang / rang gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs nas srang gi dbus na padma yod pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas phyag g-yas pa'i mthil gyis padma'i snying po la reg par mdzad de drangs nas bzhugs so // padma de drangs te g-yos pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i ri khor yug dang / ri khor yug chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang g-yos so // bdud kyi gnas thams cad na gzhal med khang dang / gnas dang / mal cha dang / stan rnams kyang rab tu g-yos so // de na gang bdud kyi bu rnams dang / bdud kyi bu mo rnams dang / bdud kyi tshogs kyi 'khor gnas pa de dag kyang 'jigs skrag cing skyo ba skyas nas phan tshun 'di skad 'dzer to // rgyu med rkyen med par @358b ni; gzhal med khang 'di dag g-yo bar mi 'gyur skad 'dzer to // na / bdag cag gi rgyal po bdud de rang gi yul nas 'phos par ma skad 'dzer to // na / gyur grang / bdag cag kyang khang pa 'di nas 'chi 'pho ba'i chos 'byung bar mi 'gyur grang / bdag cag gis blta gor ma chag go snyam ste / de nas de dag gis mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni / snyigs ma lnga can du gyur na / 'di sus legs par brgyan cing shin tu nyams dga' bar byas snyam mo // de nas rang gi yul la gnas pa'i bdud g-yog dang bcas pa de dag de na 'khod bzhin du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan cing shin tu lham me / lhan ne / lhang der bzhugs pa mthong ngo // thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad kyang sems can gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs sna tshogs su gnas pa sha stag gis yongs su gang nas sems can gcig kyang ngo mi shes te / sems can de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par te / mthong ngo // de nas de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te / bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bya @359a *// ba dang / da ltar bdag cag gi jo bo dang / g-yog tu bcas pa gang dor ba'ang dri ba'i phyir der 'dong gor ma chag snyam mo //

column2: 'di ltar dbang po drug stong ste // byed pa po ni 'di la med // de bzhin mtshan mar rtog pa yang // dngos po tsam ste g-yo ba med // tshor ba drug dang sred pa drug / reg pa drug las byung ba yin //

column2: de bzhin reg pa'i skye mched drug / stong pa yin par shes par byos // rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med par // dngos po nyid la brtag par byos // skye ba med cing 'gag med pas // 'di na rdzas kyang med par ltos // gang gis chos kun tshul gcig ste // dus gsum du yang dngos med par //

column1: yEH jQAtAH nirjarAH te vE eza mArgaH hi anuttaraH
column2: @361a *// shes pa de dag nad med de // de ni bla na med pa'i lam //

column1: trayodaSa AkAra
column2: rnam pa bcu gsum nges grol la // sems can 'du shes rnam 'jig cing // tshu rol pha rol rnam grol ba // de ni bzod pa sgom pa yin //

column1: tasmin samaye BagavataH apratihatena puNya bala vESAradya vega kuSala mUla nizyanda
column2: de nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod nams kyi stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa'i shugs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra thogs pa med pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs pa de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong pa dang /

column1: aprameya asaMKyeya akzoByagaFgA nadI vAlukA upamAH aSUnyAH SUnyAsu paQca kazAya izua prameya asaMKyeyAni sattva kowIn ayuta Sata sahasrANi atIva nirAmiza vicitrAm samADi kzAnti DAraNIm pratileBire iha budDa kzetra saMnipatitaH  pratilABaH BUt
column2: mi stong pa'i snyigs ma lnga can gangg'a'i klung dpag tu med pa mi 'khrugs pa'i bye ma snyed rnams su dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa 'di dag grags par gyur nas de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas kyang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni / shin tu zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / dad pa rnyed de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to // la la dag gis ni / ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa dang / gzungs sna tshogs thob bo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa'i sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams kyis ni / don dang / tshig dang / yi ge 'di dag @361b thos nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur to //

column1: triBiH yAnEH aprameya asaMKyeyAH sattvAH niryANam avAptAH
column2: sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ni / theg pa gsum po dag gis nges par 'byung ba thob par gyur to // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas padma'i khri la 'dzeg par bya ba'i phyir rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas me tog gis kun tu g-yogs pa mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to // thams cad mkhyen pa rga shi mya ngan gyi // 'dam du bying ba'i 'jig rten thams cad la // rab tu gzigs te mi rgyu rgyur bcas te // 'jig rten du ni chos kyi zam pa thogs // thal mo sbyar ba'i sems can rgya chen brgyas // rab tu gtams pa'i zhing la gzigs nas su // chos kyi mchod sbyin rab tu bgo bar gsol // rang gi mthu rtsal rab tu bstan du gsol // mtshungs pa med pa'i padma mngon 'dzegs te // mgon po shes rab dang ni thabs rnams kyis // chos chu sprin gyis char pa rab phob la // nyon mongs gzir ba'i mi la bstan du gsol // phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas thams cad dang // drang srong chen po shes rab ldan pa gzhan // khyod kyi dpang du de dag kun bzhugs kyi // thub pa'i dbang po bdud rnams pham par @362a *// mdzod; ;chos rnams stong pa nam mkha' lta bu dang // ngo bo nyid kyis ya ma brlar mkhyen nas // sngon gyi dam bcas rnams ni dgongs mdzod la // bla med 'khor lo dam pa bskor du gsol // chu bo bzhi dbus 'khor ba'i sems can rnams // mi yi sengge de ring bsgral du gsol // khyod kyis chos rnams shin tu thugs su chud // srid gsum mtsho las 'jig rten bsgral du gsol // shin tu rlabs chen thugs mnga' bcom ldan 'das // bde bar gshegs kyi lam ni bde ba la // 'gro ba gzud 'dod mtshungs med chos kyang ston // 'jig rten nyes pa'i dri ma bsal du gsol //

column1: aTa boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH jyotIrasaH RzIH saMhRzwaH padmAsanam puzpa saMcCannam aBinirmIya tasya padmasya AropaNa arTam yena BagavAnprAQjalim kRtvA idam avocat
column2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bur sprul pa'i them skad de las padma'i khri la mngon par 'dzegs te padma'i snying po la bzhugs so // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu thams cad du rnam par gzigs nas bdud sdig can la bka' stsal pa / bdud sdig can / ji ltar khyod kyi rkyen gyis deng 'dir 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pas sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag mngal na gnas pa dang / rga shis gtses pa rnams las rnam par grol bar 'gyur / rnam par thar par 'gyur / chu bo bzhi las yang dag par brgal bar 'gyur / zhi ba'i lam la gnas par 'gyur / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyur te / 'di la sdig can khyod ni / sems @362b can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba'i thog mar 'gro ba yin gyi / khyod dga' bar gyis shig / sdig can khyod kyis nga la chos bshad par gsol cig dang ngas deng bdud kyi dkyil 'khor mthon po'i yul gyi chu bo'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to // de nas bdud sdig can gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so // ci ste sdig med khyod la thab zhe sdang rgyags med na // ci phyir deng 'dir kun tu skrag par bya phyir chos kyang ston // de ste khyod la tha ba rgyags dang nga rgyal yod na ni // thub dbang khyod kyi thar pa ci 'dra ba dag la 'di shod cig / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa // nga ni sa la mngal gyi gnas na zla ba bcur gnas pa // de na yang ni bdud khyod nga la gsang bar rab tu sbyar // de tshe nga la 'khon dang tha ba cung zad tsam yang med // nga ni bzod dang ldan te tha ba ma lus med pa yin // nga ni btsas ma thag 'dir khyod kyis sa yang g-yo bar byas // nga gsad phyir ni rdo ba'i char pa rab tu dbab par byas // de nas khyod kyis nga yi ma yi nu zho myur bskams byas // khyod kyis nga la gnod pa rnam pa du ma ci ma byas // nga ni bsam gtan zhugs na khyod kyis bud med khrid de 'ongs // nga ni bsod snyoms rnam par spyod tshe zas kyang bcad par byas // khyod kyis rtag tu nga la rgyal srid mngon par rab tu bstabs // nga ni 'byung ba'i nub mo 'dir yang mun pa byas par gyur // de tshe khyod dang skyes bu rnams kyis @363a *// grong khyer kun tu bskor // rdzu 'phrul gyis ni song tshe rdzi char drag po rab tu phab // sa ni 'dom do 'phang tsam rdo ba dag gis gang bar byas // zhi ba'i gnas na gnas pa'i tshe yang sgra ni rab tu phyung // nga ni shin tu dka' ba spyod tshe grang ba'i rlung dang ni // 'bab chu 'gram na gnas tshe khyod kyis chu bo rab tu btang // nga ni gsad par bya phyir khyod kyis sengge rab tu btang // de tshe khyod kyis nga yi zas la drang po'i dug kyang btab // nga ni byang chub shing drung nye bar yang dag song ba na // rdo rje dang ni gnam lcags spu gri mda' char khyod kyis phab // 'gro la phan phyir rdo rje'i gdan la mngon par gnas pa na // khyod kyis dur smrig gos kyang 'jim rdzab dag gis rab tu bskus // de na yang ni nga gan khyod kyis bu mo rnams bkye ste // nga gsad phyir ni khyod nyid mthu dang bcas te 'ongs mod kyi // 'on kyang khyod kyis nga yi yid la gnod byas cung zad med // ngas ni khyod btul nas su byang chub mtshungs pa med pa thob // 'on kyang ngo tsha bor te 'dir 'ongs nas ni yang smra 'am // sdig pa'i tshul gyis 'od srung mchog la sogs pa bzlog byas te // khyod kyis sems can bye ba dum ma rungs byas nas kyang // snying rje bor te 'dir yang nga la rgol zhing sgyu byed dam // nga yis zas ma zos pa de yi tshe yang khyod kyis su // nga gsad phyir ni glang chen myos pa drag shul can yang btang // sa steng nga la lhas byin gyis ni @363b rdo ba 'phangs pa dang // kye ma ngas ni zla ba gsum du rta chas zos pa dang // phyar ka gtang phyir bu mo mdzes ldan rab tu gang btang dang // me mdag 'bar ba mi bzad pas ni 'obs rnams bkang ba dang // kha zas dag ni myur du gdug pa'i dug dang sbyar ba yi // de la sdig pa'i las can khyod ni rtsa bar nges pa yin // khyod nyid dpung bcas bu dang lhan cig sder bcas 'ongs nas su // nga gsad phyir ni mda' bo che dang ral gri mda' mang thogs // 'on kyang 'dir ni khyod kyis nga yi spu gcig ma g-yos na // ci phyir khyod ni rgyags par gyur nas da dung 'dug / ji snyed bdud ni stong phrag bye ba rgol du yang btsud kyang // sems can bye ba khrag khrig dag ni 'dir yang lhags nas su // zhing kun rab tu gang bar 'dug pa nga yi dbang yin te // nga ni khyod phyir mchog tu byams pa'i yid kyis gnas par bya // nga ni snying rje'i gnas te 'gro ba rjes su 'dzin byed pa // khyod ni shin tu gtum po nga la rtag tu bgegs byed de // thub pa'i dbang po khyu mchog 'di dag nga yi dbang yin da ltar tha ma'i dus la nga ni sangs rgyas mdzad pa bya //

column1: sarva lokam samIkzya Darma setum sRjasva sa carAcara loke
column2: rnam thar sems kyis sems can rnams kyi don yang spyad par bya // smras par gyur kyang bzod pa yongs su btang bar mi bya'o // nga la phrag dog byed ba rab tu khro ba'i yid med de // khyed ni rjes su gzung phyir nga nyid rtag tu mngon par brtson // nga la gsol dang khyod yid zhi phyir 'jig rten gsum dag tu // mchog tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi bdud @364a *// rtsi bshad par bya // de phyir khyod kyi sdig pa'i las rnams med par rab 'gyur gyi // 'jig rten mgon po nga la yid ni myur du dad par byos // khyod ni rtag tu 'di na gnod pa bya bar rab sems kyang // khyod dgrol phyir ni nga snying rtag tu byams par rab tu dang // sdig pa'i blo gros por la dad bcas yid la byos shig dang // ring por mi thogs khyod ni byang chub tu yang lung bstan to // de nas bdud sdig can bcom ldan 'das la rab tu khros te 'khrugs shing rngam nas de nas slar 'gro bar 'dod pa dang / bdag gi mgul pa bcing ba lngas bcings pa snyam du shes te / 'jigs skrag pa'i sgra dbyung bar 'dod kyang de ma nus nas bcom ldan 'das bgrongs pa'i phyir rang khros pa'i mthus shin tu tsha ba'i dbugs btang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs de shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i me tog tu mngon par sprul to / // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te chos kyang ston pa de thams cad kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i gdugs su byin / // gyis brlabs so // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la gsol pa / me tog gi gdugs 'di dag ga las mchis / @364b su'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lags / bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // rigs kyi bu dag / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de / de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa zhes bya ba de rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sngon gyi smon lam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos ston te / de bzhin gshegs pa de da ltar bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad mthon por byed pa / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i rgyud thams cad dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi sgron ma yun ring du gnas par byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam par 'phel ba'i brtson 'grus kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs byed pa / dgra dang phas kyis rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcod par byed pa / ngo mi mtshar dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / rtsod pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / mu ge dang / 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang / 'thab pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / 'ching ba dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin par gang zhing tsha ba dang / rlung dang / tsho ba dang / nad dang / sgra mi snyan pa thams cad @365a *// rab tu zhi bar byed pa / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad 'dun par byed pa / rgyal rigs thams cad 'dun par byed cing 'gugs pa / rigs bzhi thams cad chos kyi don la 'dzud pa / shes rab kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar byed pa / lam drang po rab tu ston pa / khyim dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / pho brang 'khor dang / yul 'khor thams cad 'dun par byed pa / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / nyin bar dang / mtshan mo dang / zla ba gcig dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus dang / lo thams cad mthun par byed pa / lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman thams cad grub par byed pa / bzo dang / las kyi mtha' dang / gnas dang / byin gyis brlabs dang / dgos pa thams cad grub par byed pa / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi nyes pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa / rig pa dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / mos pa dang / dpa' ba dang / brtan pa dang / bzod pa dang / spobs pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa / chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i snang bas rab tu sad par byed pa / 'phags pa'i rigs bzhis chos kyi tshul byin gyis rlob pa / theg pa chen po ston par byed pa /

column1: kzetram samIkzya pUrNam kRta dutt
column2: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phel bar byed pa / sems can chen po rnams dbugs 'byin pa @365b phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rdo rje lta bu'i sems byin gyis rlob pa / sa bcu la yang dag par 'jug par byed pa /

column1: kleSa hatAnAm prajQA upAyO pratidarSaya apratima padme
column2: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa khong du chud par byed pa / dbang bskur ba'i chos dang byang chub la gzhol bar byed pa / gdul ba'i sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin pa /

column1: aBiruhya nATa pravarza Darma vRzwim
column2: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba / sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos khyab par byed pa / pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dzud pa / bla na med pa'i lam la yang dag par 'jog par byed pa / chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa / chos kyi ros sems can rnams tshim par byed pa / sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa / bdud bzhi'i yul las rab tu thar par byed pa / phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jog par byed pa / chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'chad par bzhed do // 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsungs so // byin gyis brlabs so // gcig la gcig dgyes so // da ltar phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das @366a *// gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsung ngo // byin gyis rlob bo // gcig la gcig dgyes par mdzad do // ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung ba de dag kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus yongs su 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsung bar 'gyur ro // byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro // gcig la gcig dgyes par mdzad par 'gyur ro // de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag yod pa de dag so so'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la yongs su zhus pa / bcom ldan 'das / bdag cag gis sngon ma thos pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /

column1: lakzaNa parivartaH nAma paQcamaH
column2: tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gang 'di ltar yon tan mang po dang /

column1: start rkp
column2: bgyid pa / 'di ltar yon tan bsam @366b gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa / chos thams cad la sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i snang ba bgyid pa nas zhi ba'i bar du bgyid pa de gang lags / chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa / bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa nas phung po'i lhag ma mchis pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du bgyid pa de skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // rigs kyi bu dag / nged kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der 'dong ngo // da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor der 'dong ngo //

column1: dutt
column2: cing / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pas mdun du bdar nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du de bzhin @367a *// gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs te / de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de dang lhan cig sems can thams cad la phan gshegs te / pa dang / ngan pa spyod pa las bzlog pa dang / bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bla na med pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur / byin gyis rlob par 'gyur / gcig la gcig rjes su dgyes par mdzad par 'gyur ro // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis bskor cing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis bltas te chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur gyi / khyed cag las gang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa mnyan pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa @367b gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dus gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na bzhugs pa de dag la mchod pa bya ba dang / chos de yang nyan pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha'i yul dang / bdud kyi yul thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi brgyan bkod pa de dag la blta ba dang / sangs rgyas mang po 'dus pa sngon ma mthong ma thos pa blta bar 'dod pa de dag dang / da nged lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa ga la ba der 'dong ngo // de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to // btsun pa bcom ldan 'das / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzungs 'di 'chad pa na / gal te bdag cag gis gnas rnyed cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar tshogs pa de dag la'ang phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / mchod pa dang / chos nyan par rdo thogs pa lta na / de bzhin du bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa ga la ba der chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs @368a *// phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa mnyan pa'i slad du mchis te / der bdag cag gis dus gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa zhig bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa rnams la mchod pa bgyi'o // de dag las chos kyang mnyan par bgyi'o // der bdag cag gis rdzu 'phrul gyis yul bkod pa bzhis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed legs par brgyan pa de'ang blta bar bgyi / 'dus pa chen po bkod pa de dag kyang blta bar bgyi'o // de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so nas rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // rigs kyi bu dag / khyed cag 'jig rten gyi khams der 'jug pa'i gnas dang / go skabs kyi phyir de ltar the tshom ma za zhig / de ltar nem nur ma byed cig / de ci'i phyir zhe na / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pas sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa ni / mtha' yas so // rigs kyi bu dag / de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de thabs mkhas pa chen po dang ldan pas go skabs yongs so // rigs kyi bu dag / yongs su brtag par bzung ste sems can gang la la sems can gyi @368b khams su bsdu bar bsdus pa khams dang skye mched las gnas pa'i sems can de dag gal te re re'i lus kyang ri rab tsam du gyur tu zin kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa des sems can lus de lta bur gyur pa de dag thams cad yungs 'bru gcig gi nang du chud par nus so // sems can re re zhing yang yul dang gnas kyi go skabs yangs te / sems can de dag phan tshun du mig rgyang gis kyang mi sleb bo // yungs 'bru gcig tu sems can thams cad kyi lus bcug kyang bri ba dang / gang bar mi mngon te / rigs kyi bu dag / de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de ni; thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no // rigs kyi bu dag / gzhan yang sra ba nyid ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni / sa'i khams te / de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa des sa'i khams thams cad rdul gcig gi steng du 'jog nus la / rdul de gcig gi steng du sa'i khams thams cad bzhag kyang bri ba'am / gang bar mi mngon te / de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de ni / thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no // rigs kyi bu dag / gzhan yang gang cung zad gsher bar snang ba de thams cad ni / chu'i khams te / de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa des chu'i khams de thams cad skra'i rtse mo gcig tu chud par nus la skra'i rtse mo de gcig tu chu'i khams de thams cad bcug kyang bri ba'am / gang bar mi mngon no // rigs kyi bu dag / gzhan yang ji tsam du dro bar @369a *// snang ba de thams cad ni / me'i khams te / me'i khams gang sngon byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba de thams cad rdul phra rab gcig tu chud par nus la / me'i khams de thams cad rdul phra rab de gcig tu bcug kyang gnas shin tu yangs te / rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o // rigs kyi bu dag / gzhan yang gang cung zad rlung gi khams su snang ba'i rlung gi khams de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa des ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu 'jug nus la / rlung gi khams de thams cad ba spu'i khung bu de gcig tu bcug kyang gnas shin tu yangs te rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o // rigs kyi bu dag / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa des ni / gang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi sems can thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag thams cad dang lhan cig tu rdul gcig gi steng du 'jog par nus te / rdul gcig la sems can de dag thams cad 'byung ba chen po de dag dang bcas par rang gi yul gyi las kyi mtha' rnams spyod kyang gnas shin tu yangs par rgyu ste / phan tshun gnod pa'ang med la rdul gcig gi rtse mo de yang bri ba'am; gang bar yang mi mngon te / de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de ni / thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan no // rigs kyi bu dag / gzhan yang dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems @369b can rnams kyi skye mched drug dang / spyod pa dang / nye bar len pa dang / smon lam dang / byin gyi rlabs dang / tshig gi lam gyi sgra dang / yi ge dang / tshig brjod pa dang / 'du byed gsum gyi las kyi mtha'i bya ba dang / phung po dang / spyod pa dang / bsags pa'i bya ba tha dad pa ji snyed pa dang / gang yang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha'i mu nas bzung ste dus gsum du gtogs pa'i 'gro ba drug tu 'khor ba na srid pa 'grub pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba 'byung ba dang / sa'i khams kyi rdul phra rab ji snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i skad cig thang gcig yud tsam 'das pa ji snyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa dang pa dang / / sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi longs pa dang / / spyod pa dang / kun tu spyod pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa des skad cig gcig la rab tu mkhyen te / de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de ni / mtshan nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan pas mi rtog rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub pa dus gsum gyi mtha' yongs su mkhyen to // rigs kyi bu dag / de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa de sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa'i @370a *// ye shes la mkhas pas mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i thabs tshad med pa 'di lta bu dang ldan no // mtshan nyid bshad pa 'di lung bstan pa na phyogs tha dad pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi so so'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag smon lam gyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur to // 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las /

column1: zazWaH parivartaH
column2: mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o //// bam po drug pa / yang de'i tshe shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang thabs cig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis gshegs par chas nas skad cig gcig tsam la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byon te / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs nas padma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhugs so // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas padma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba de dag la @370b 'khod do // de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa / sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyang skad cig thang gcig yud tsam de nyid la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su byon to // de bzhin gshegs pa re re'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa dang / nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa de ga la bzhugs par byon to // byon nas kyang padma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba rnams la bzhugs so // yang de'i tshe na lho phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che tog ces bya ba byon nas padma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o; ;de bzhin du byang phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra zhes bya ba byon nas padma'i snying po la bzhugs so // yang de'i tshe nub phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med ces bya ba byon nas padma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o // 'og gi phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba byon nas padma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o // steng gi logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba byon nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa gangg'a'i klung gi bye @371a *// ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dang thabs cig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de nas gshegs par gi bye @371a *// chas pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs nas padma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba gi bye @371a *// chas pa dang / la bzhugs so // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang ji ltar rang gi bsod nams dang gi bye @371a *// chas pa dang / la bzhugs so // / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis padma'i gdan sprul pa rnams la 'khod do gi bye @371a *// chas pa dang / la bzhugs so // / // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la dag gis ni / dzambu chu bo'i gser gyi char phab bo // gong du smos pa bzhin sbyar te / la la dag gis ni / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par bskor bar byas so // la la dag gis ni / chos nyan pas bskor nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'khod do // la la dag gis ni / rang gi dge ba'i phyogs yid la byed cing gnas so // yang de'i tshe na zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas thal mo sbyar te rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs bskyed pas @371b sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ma lus par dbyangs kyis bkang ste 'di skad ces smras so dang / // the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa // thub pa zla ba kun nas gshegs // sngon chad ma mthong ma thos pa'i // dge 'dun phun sum tshogs 'di snang // byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs mchog / sangs rgyas kun gyis rab gang bas // zhing 'di mchod rten gyur ba ste // zhing rnams kun gyis phyag byas so; ;gang na sems can smad pa yi // zhing ni snyigs ma lnga ldan 'dir // thub pa snang mdzad rgyu med par // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas deng mi gshegs // de ring bdud ngan tshar bcad cing // nag po'i phyogs ni rab gzhom dang // spyod pa dge ba bsdu ba'i phyir // de yi don du kun nas gshegs // yid ni rab tu dad byos la // bdud sde rab tu 'joms pa yi // chos nyid zhi ba rab nyon la // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur bar byos // theg pa chen po spyod pa'i lam // bzod pa'i go bgos shes par byos // nyon mongs thams cad zad bya'i phyir // gzungs 'di de ring mnyan par byos // gdan rnams la ni bzhugs nas ni // srung ba 'di ni bshad gsol phyir // de phyir thams cad mgrin gcig tu // 'dren pa rnams ni spyan drongs shig / dam chos yun ring gnas bya'i phyir // sgrib pa thams cad zhi byed pa // chos rnams thams cad sdud pa yi // gzungs 'di gzhan gyis mi thub bo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa thob pa grangs med dpag tu @372a *// med pa de snyed kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams padma'i gdan 'di dag la bzhugs te deng thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis byams pa chen po'i mchog dang / bzod pa yongs su bsgoms pa mi 'jigs pa'i rgyu mthun pa bshad pa / chos thams cad sdud pa / 'jigs pa dang bral ba la 'jug pa / bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das par bgyid pa / bdud kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol la chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar bgyid pa / nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa / dgra thams cad tshar gcod pa / the tshom thams cad gcod pa / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dzud pa / 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar par bgyid pa / thams cad srung ba bla na med pa / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos thams cad dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa mi brjed pa / spyod pa thams cad kyi thabs dang ye shes la mkhas pa kun ston pa / bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi skye mched dang / byin gyi rlabs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa la 'jug pa / snang ba'i ye shes mkhas pa la 'jug pa nas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi snying po 'dzin pa'i bar gyi gzungs 'di sems can rnams kyi gzi brjid dang / kha dog dang / longs spyod dang / @372b stobs dang / grags pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa dang / spobs pa dang / dran pa rnam par 'phel ba dang / thos pa 'dzin pa mi brjed pa dang / dgra thams cad pham par bgyid pa dang / lo tog mngon par 'grub pa dang / bslab pa 'dzin pa dang / dran pa'i snod du 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub yang dag par thob par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gzugs 'di da 'dir bdag cag la bshad du gsol / chos kyi tshul rjes su gzung ba dang / yun ring du gnas pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs chud mi 'dza' ba dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam mtha' dag bstan pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / nam mkha' dang / de bzhin nyid dbyer ma mchis pa dang / mun pa dang / snang ba dang / dmigs pa dang / mi dmigs pa dang / tshu rol dang / pha rol dang / rtogs pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa dang / chos thams cad mi skye ba dang / mi 'byung ba dang / mi 'gag pa mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dngos po ma mchis shing yang dag pa'i mtha' dbyer ma mchis pa dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / rnam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis 'dir bdag cag la chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi @373a *// dkyil 'khor dam pa'i gzungs bshad du gsol / gang 'dir thos ma thag tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa dag la dkon mchog gsum mngon sum du gyur cig / sems can rnams phan tshun du dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyid cing phan par bgyid par gyur cig / sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / lung bstan pa thob par gyur cig /

column1: tezAn= ca budDAnAm BagavatAm samAdarSanena eva budDa kzetra antargatAnAm sattvAnAm rAga dveza moha AdIni sarvezAm citta cEtyezu praSemuH
column2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis kyang chos bstan pa'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang nas padma'i snying po de dag la bzhugs so // ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa'i phyir dran pa dang / dad pa dang / dang ba dang / mos pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems dang / sems las byung ba rnams la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / lta ba ngan pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang / nye bar len pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa kun gzhi'i nyes pa dag rab tu zhi bar @373b 'gyur ba dang / sems can so so nas 'di snyam du bdag gcig pu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug gi / 'di na gzhan su'ang med do //

column1: ekEkaH ca sattvaH evam saMjAnIta imAm ekEkaH taTAgataH sarva cetasA samanvAhRtya sarva jvara praSamana Darmam deSayati
column2: bdag gcig pu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs thams cad kyis dgongs te nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par bzhed do // 'di na gzhan sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la chos mnyan pa'i phyir gsol ba ma btab bo //

column1: tena Kalu punar samayena ye asmin kRtsne budDa kzetre antargatAH sarva sattvAH sarvandriya upastabDAH yat tu asmAkam budDAH BagavantaHdeSayantu
column2: snyam du shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi smon lam mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so // yang de'i tshe gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dbang po thams cad bsten te thal mo sbyar nas de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag cag la chos bshad du gsol /

column1: asmAkam Badanta sva gatam Darma vayam budDAnAm BagavatAm Darmezu pratipatsyAmahe
column2: btsun pa / bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bdag cag la chos bshad du gsol / bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nan tan gyis bsdu bar bgyi'o //

column1: tena Kalu punar samayena aparezAm budDAnAm BagavatAm pUjA karmaNe sa SAkya muniH taTAgataH ganDa vyUha atikrAntena parama uttama viSizwena udAreNa ganDena sarvam idam budDa kzetram sPuwam akarot
column2: de nas yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan rnams la mchod pa'i phyir spos bkod pa las shin tu lhag pa'i spos gong du mchog tu khyad par du gyur pa rgya chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad khyab par byin gyis brlabs so //

column1: budDAnAm BagavatAm pUjA karmaNe sarva budDa kzetra antargatAH ca sarva sattvAH nAnA ratna puzpa mAlya vilepaneH nAnAt Catra Dvaja patAkA alaFkArE
column2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lhag ma rnams mchod pa'i @374a *// phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi lag pa rin po che dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub sna tshogs dag gis gang bar byin gyis brlabs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so //

column1: budDAnAm BagavatAm pUjA karmaNe evam Aha samanvAharantu budDAH BagavantaH ye kecid etarhi daSasu dikzu lokaDAtO
column2: da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dri ba'i phyir byon pa rnams dgongs su gsol /

column1: aham pUrva praNiDAnena evam pratikUle paQca kazAye loke anuttarAm samyaksamboDim aBisaMbudDaH nazwa ASayAnAm pranazwa mArgANAm dutt
column2: bdag sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'di 'dra bar rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te / sems can bsam pa nyams pa / lam rab tu stor ba /

column1: avidyA anDAnAm tamisra BUtAnAm kleSa AkziptAnAm traya pAya saMprasTitAnAm akuSala samavaDAnAnAm
column2: ma rig pa'i mun pa dang rab rib kyi ling tog gis nyon mongs pa'i mun par bcug pa / ngan song gsum du zhugs pa /

column1: sarva kuSala rahitAnAm sarva vidvat parivarjitAnAm Anantarya kRtAnAm sadDarma varjitAnAm
column2: mi dge ba dang 'grogs pa; dge ba thams cad dang bral ba / mkhas pa thams cad kyis yongs su spangs pa / mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba /

column1: caryA apavAdakAnAm akRpa ASayAnAm sattvAnAm kAruNya arTam mahA kRpA vIrya bala udyogena SIta uzNa vAta Atapa praSamanAya
column2: 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa / snying rje med pa'i bsam pa can gyi sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i slad du snying brtse ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi brtson pa chen pos grang ba dang / dro ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba dang / @374b ngal ba dang / chad pa dang du blang bar bgyi'o //

column1: grAma nagara nigama janapadAn pada BayAm upasaMkramAmi
column2: grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / yul 'khor du rkang gis 'gro bar bya'o //

column1: sattva hita arTam su alpa rUkza virasa paramajagupsitam pratikUlam AhAram BakzayizyAmi
column2: sems can la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du rtsub pa dang / nyung ba dang / ro med pa / shin tu smad pa / mi mthun pa'i zas bza' bar bgyi'o // de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i slad du sbom pa / rtsub pa /

column1: tezAm kuSala mUla janana arTam karpAsa BaFga cIvara pAMsu kulAni prAvRNomi
column2: reg na mi bde ba / sha na dang / shing bal dang / gso ma'i ras dang / phyag dar khrod kyi gos bgo bar bgyi'o //

column1: parvata giri kandara vana zaNxa SUnya AgAra SmaSAna SayyA Asanam pariBunajmi
column2: ri dang / ri sul dang / nags stug po dang / grong stong dang / dur khrod du gnas par bgyi ba nas rtsva'i mal cha dang / gso ma dang / shing gi 'dab ma rtsub pa / dri mi zhim pa / reg na mi bde ba'i mal cha spyad par bgyi'o //

column1: upAya kOSalya mahA karuNA vIrya sannahanena viviDAm kaTAm kaTayAmi
column2: bdag gis thabs mkhas pa ndang / snying rje chen po dang / brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos nas sems can rnams la gtam rnam pa sna tshogs bgyi ste /

column1: kzatriyeByaH rAja ESvarya kaTAm kaTayAmi
column2: rgyal rigs rnams la ni / rgyal srid dang / dbang phyug gi gtam bgyi'o // bram ze rnams la ni /

column1: brAhmaNeByaH veda nakzatra kaTAm kaTayAmi
column2: rig byed dang / skar ma'i gtam dang / blon po rnams la ni / yul dang las kyi mtha'i gtam dang / sman pa rnams la ni / khams dang / sman dang / sgrub pa'i gtam dang / tshong pa rnams la ni /

column1: amAtyeByaH janapada karmAnta kaTAm kaTayAmi
column2: nyo tshong gi gtam dang / dmangs rnams la ni /

column1: vaNigBya kraya vikraya kaTAm kuwumbeByaH karmAnta aBiniveSa kaTAm strIByaH varNa alaFkAra putra ESvarya sapatna kaTAm SramaNeByaH kzAnti sOrakaTayAmi
column2: las kyi mtha' la mngon par zhen pa'i gtam dang / bud med rnams la ni / kha dog dang / rgyan dang / bu dang / phyug pa dang / 'gran zla med pa'i gtam dang / dge sbyong rnams la bzod pa dang / @375a *// des pa dang / las gsum la brtson pa'i gtam bgyi'o //

column1: sattva paripAkAya aprAptasya prAptaye niyunajmi anaDigatasya aDigamAya asAkzAtkRtasya sAkzAt kriyAyE amuktAnAm dutt
column2: sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du ma thob pa thob par bgyi ba dang / mngon du ma bgyis pa mngon du bgyi bar gzud do //

column1: mocanAya nAnAviDAni duHKAni utsahAmi
column2: ma thar pa rnams rab tu thar par bgyi ba'i slad du sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs la spro bar bgyi'o //

column1: sattva paripAkAya janapada caryAm carAmi
column2: sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du yul thams cad du rgyu bar bgyi'o bar bgyi'o // // de lta mod kyi sems can 'di dag ni / de na bdag la gshe'o // mi snyan pa zer ro //

column1: aTa ca punar ye ime sattvAH tatra mAm AkroSanti pariBAzanti IrzyA anvitena DarmeNa aBUtena aByAKyAnti
column2: phrag dog gi chos kyi rgyus bdag la 'khrig pa'i chos kyis med pa la skur pa 'debs so //

column1: kuhana lapana mAyA SAWya mRzA vAda pAruzyEH strI vacanEH aByAKyAnti pAMsuBiH mAm avakiranti
column2: kha gsag dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / sgyu dang / g-yo dang / rdzun smra ba dang / zhe gcod pa dang / bud med kyi tshig dag gis skur pa 'debs so // bdag la sas 'thor ro //

column1: Sastra viza agni cakra tomara Sara Kaxga Sakti paraSvaDa SUla AyuDa vRzwiBiH mama vaDAya parAkrAmanti
column2: bdag la gsad pa'i phyir mtshon dang / dug dang / me dang / 'khor lo dang / mda' bo che dang / mda' dang / ral gri dang / mdung dang / dgra sta dang / rdo dang / mtshon cha'i char 'bebs so //

column1: hasti ASIviza siMha vyAGra vRza mahiza vRka mahA nagnAn= ca mad vaDAya utsRjanti
column2: bdag gsad pa'i phyir glang po che dang / sbrul sdug pa dang / sengge dang / stag dang / glang dang / ma he dang / spyang ki dang / phag rgod dang / tshan po che rnams kyang 'gyed do //

column1: mama AvAsa vihAra kUwAgArAn aSucinA durganDena ApUrayanti
column2: bdag gi gnas dang / gnas khang dang / gtsug lag khang yang mi gtsang ba dang / dri nga bas 'gengs so //

column1: mad SrAvakANAm ca antar nagaram anupravizwAnAm ime anAryAH sattvAH anAcAreNa nRtya gItena anuvicarizyanti
column2: bdag gi nyan thos grong khyer du bzhugs pa rnams la phan 'dogs pa ma yin pa'i sems can rnams @375b kyis glu dang gar tshul ma yin pa byed du 'dzud do //

column1: Sata sahasra upAyEH mad vaDAya udyuktAH SAsana antarDAnAya ca Darma netrI pradIpa nirvANAya Darma Dvaja prapAtanAya DarmanetrI praBedAya mamamAraNAya udyuktAH
column2: thabs brgya stong du mas bdag gsad pa'i phyir brtson no // bdag gi bstan pa nub par bya ba dang / chos kyi tshul gyi sgron ma gsad pa dang / chos kyi grub shig pa dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsnyal ba dang / bdag gi chos kyi mchod sbyin rnam par gtor ba'i phyir brtson no //

column1: tat Kalu etarhi sarve budDAH BagavantaH tezAm budDAnAm BagavatAm Darma netrIm avalokayata
column2: da sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos kyi tshul la gzigs te /

column1: yaTA te budDEH BagavadBiH asmin klizwe paQca kazAya yukte kAle mahAsannipAtam kRtvA sadDarma netrI cira sTiti arTam sarvam Ara bala vizaya pramardana arTam sarva tri ratna vaMSa sTiti anupacCeda arTam sattvAnAm kuSala mUla varDana arTam sarva para pravAda sahaDarma nigraha arTam sattvAnAm kalikalaha durBikza roga para cakra banDana vigraha vivAda akAla SIta uzNa vAta vRzwi kAya vAc manaH kleSa praSamana arTam dutt sarva gRha grAma nagara rAzwra rakzaNa arTam sarva SAWya vizakAKorda mohana duHsvapna durdarSana arTam sarva DAnya ozaDi Pala puzpa rasa sattva upajIvi arTam kzatriya brAhmaNa viS SUdra kuSala caryA niyojana arTam
column2: ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dir 'dus pa chen po mdzad nas dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs gnas pa rgyun mi chad par bgyi ba dang / sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / dgra dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar gcad pa dang / sems can rnams kyi 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / 'ching ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / rgol ba dang / dus ma yin par grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / char ba dang / rlung dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi nyes pa dang / lta ba ngan pa ya nga ba rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad 'dun par bgyi ba dang / khyim dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / @376a *// grong rdal dang / yul 'khor thams cad bsrung ba dang / g-yo dang / dug dang / byad dang / rmongs byed dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad gzhil ba dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / bcud thams cad kyis sems can nye bar 'tsho bar bgyi ba dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / dmangs rigs dang / rje'u rigs rnams dge ba spyod pa la gzud pa dang / byang chub kyi sems rab tu bskyed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gzud pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs shes pa la mkhas pa dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtog pa dang / mos pa dang / dpa' ba dang / brtan pa dang / spobs pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / dbang bskur ba'i sar dbugs dbyung ba la 'dzud cing ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad du sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad cing byin gyis brlabs te gcig la gcig dgyes pa de 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da ltar phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dir @376b dri ba'i phyir gshegs te bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsrung ba'i slad du chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /

column1: boDisattva citta utpAda pAramitA pUraNa arTam boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm upAya jQAna kOSalya smRti mati gati SOrya pratiBANa vivRdDi arTam aBize tEH pUrvakEH taTAgatEH arhadBiH saMbudDEH ayam vajra Darma sama tA pratItya Darma hRdaya samucCraya viDvaMsanI DaraNI mudrA pada praBeda praveS Darma paryAyaH BAzitaH DizWitaH nyonyam anumoditaH tat sADu evam eva etarhi ye daSasu dikzu budDa BagavantaH tizWantaH yApayantaH iha mama budDa kzetre paQca kazAye pRcCAyE samAgatAH saMnizaNNAH sannipatitAH te sarve asya budDa kzetrasya ArakzAyE
column2: tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par phyag rgya dang / bgyi ba dang /

column1: imam vajra Darma sama tA pratItya Darma hRdaya samucCraya viDvaMsana DAraNI mudrA pada praBeda praveSa vyAkaraNam

column2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas shing phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / chos kyi bcud kyis sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bgyi ba'i slad du legs par bshad du gsol / byin gyis brlab tu gsol / bshad nas kyang phan tshun rjes su dgyes par mdzad du gsol /
